articles.title: 'Absolutely unfair' - Colombia defeated after controversial Copa America ending vs Brazil - Goal India
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.

articles.title: CDC panel meeting over vaccine-heart issues link in younger Americans - News 12 Long Island
articles.description: The agency is investigating a possible spike in cases of heart inflammation after people in those age groups got their second dose of the Pfizer of Moderna vaccine.
articles.content:
